description: Number of root quadruples with entry -n for integer Apollonian circle packings.
links: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
R. L. Graham, J. C. Lagarias, C. L. Mallows, Allan Wilks and C. H. Yan, Apollonian Circle Packings: Number Theory, arXiv:math/0009113 [math.NT], 2000-2003.
formula: See Theorem 4.3 in Graham et al. link.
prog: (PARI) chim4(p) = if (p % 2, (-1)^((p-1)/2), 0);delta(n) = if ((n % 4)==2, 1, 0);a(n) = {if (n==1, 1, f = factor(n)[,1]; n/4*prod(k=1, #f~, (1 - chim4(f[k])/f[k])) + 2^(omega(n)-delta(n)-1));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 13 2015
author: Jeffrey C. Lagarias (lagarias(AT)umich.edu)
extensions: Thanks to _Robert G. Wilson v_ for pointing out that one of the terms was wrong.
Offset changed to 1 and more terms from _Michel Marcus_, May 13 2015
